inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of precocious puberty or premature thelarche
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 0-6 year old girls at time of diagnosis for the medical record review
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 0-8 year old girls at baseline for the re-examination
inclusion.label: met

notes: A 12-year-old girl with Turner syndrome, treating with GH since 6 months ago. She is obese and mentally retarded.
